comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historic Winnipeg, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Rare picture of Eaton's during the brief period that it had 6 floors.

comment.author: 10435646@N00
comment._content: Judging by the emptry streets (with no streetcars in sight), and the curtains drawn over the Eaton's display windows, this photo was taken on the Lord's Day.
